languages.text:
"Схлестнулись кромки ядовитых слов
В ретивом танце махинаций рока.
Но кто одержит верх, а кто падет?
Бесспорно — пьеса кончится жестоко.
Любезен был Великий Кукловод,
В партера мрак мне даровав проход".

traits.locale_text:
"Схлестнулись кромки ядовитых слов

Любезен был Великий Кукловод,
В партера мрак мне даровав проход".
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Harlequin

languages.text:
"Of vitriol verbose the cut and thrust
Keep time with fate's own machinations grave,
But whose deft footwork leads to naught but dust?
While from its brutal finish none can save
This play, the Puppet Master granted me
Through murky stalls a path obligingly."

"Схлестнулись кромки ядовитых слов

languages.text:
“尖酸的言语是如此刻薄，
与命运的阴谋不谋而合。
是谁踏着轻盈步履，
却注定将徒劳无益？
没人能逃过残酷的结局。
傀儡大师安排这出好戏，
蜿蜒的小路上满是尘泥。”
languages.original_text:
"Of vitriol verbose the cut and thrust
Keep time with fate's own machinations grave,
But whose deft footwork leads to naught but dust?
While from its brutal finish none can save
This play, the Puppet Master granted me
Through murky stalls a path obligingly."

traits.locale_text:
“尖酸的言语是如此刻薄，
与命运的阴谋不谋而合。
是谁踏着轻盈步履，

没人能逃过残酷的结局。
傀儡大师安排这出好戏，
蜿蜒的小路上满是尘泥。”
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Harlequin

languages.text:
「切り裂き、突き刺す、悪意に満ちた言葉
運命の策略の墓を守る
しかし、巧みな足さばきで無に帰すのは誰だ？
その残酷な結末から、誰も救われることはない
この芝居は汚れた屋台を通り抜け
人形使いが私に与えてくれた」
languages.original_text:
"Of vitriol verbose the cut and thrust
Keep time with fate's own machinations grave,
But whose deft footwork leads to naught but dust?
While from its brutal finish none can save
This play, the Puppet Master granted me
Through murky stalls a path obligingly."

人形使いが私に与えてくれた」
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Harlequin

languages.text:
«Los tajos y estocadas de veneno verboso
siguen el ritmo de las maquinaciones del destino,
pero ¿qué pasos conducen a un fin pesaroso?
Nadie puede evitar su desenlace definitivo,
mas, para esta obra, me otorgó el titiritero
aun por aguas turbias un camino certero».
languages.original_text:
"Of vitriol verbose the cut and thrust
Keep time with fate's own machinations grave,
But whose deft footwork leads to naught but dust?
While from its brutal finish none can save
This play, the Puppet Master granted me
Through murky stalls a path obligingly."

languages.text:
« Le verbe vitriolique tranche et transperce
En rythme avec les machinations du destin,
Mais quel pas habile pourra donc y mettre fin ?
Inéluctable est l'issue de cette pièce,
Mais le Marionnettiste m'a permis
De me frayer un chemin jusqu'ici. »
languages.original_text:
"Of vitriol verbose the cut and thrust
Keep time with fate's own machinations grave,
But whose deft footwork leads to naught but dust?
While from its brutal finish none can save
This play, the Puppet Master granted me
Through murky stalls a path obligingly."

Mais le Marionnettiste m'a permis

traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Harlequin

languages.text:
"Wortreiche Anklagen schlagen und schneiden,
stets mit des Schicksals Räderwerk im Takt,
doch nur zu Staub führt das geschickte Leiden.
Brutal enden wird dies' Stück, so will's der Fakt,
dennoch schritt der Puppenspieler zur Tat,
zeigte mir im Parkett wahrhaftig einen Pfad."
languages.original_text:
"Of vitriol verbose the cut and thrust
Keep time with fate's own machinations grave,
But whose deft footwork leads to naught but dust?
While from its brutal finish none can save
This play, the Puppet Master granted me
Through murky stalls a path obligingly."

languages.text:
"Yakan lakırdılar keserler, delerler,
Kaderin kendi planları ve zaman aynı mezarda,
Lakin kimdir ki toz olmayacak kadar marifetliler?
Kimse kurtaramayacak bu oyunu burada
Erişeceği vahşi sondan... Kuklacı bana böyle buyurdu,
Belli belirsiz duruşlardan bir yol lütfedip durdu."
languages.original_text:
"Of vitriol verbose the cut and thrust
Keep time with fate's own machinations grave,
But whose deft footwork leads to naught but dust?
While from its brutal finish none can save
This play, the Puppet Master granted me
Through murky stalls a path obligingly."

traits.locale_text:
"Yakan lakırdılar keserler, delerler,
Kaderin kendi planları ve zaman aynı mezarda,
Lakin kimlerdir toz olmayacak kadar marifetliler?
Ve kimse kurtaramayacak bu oyunu burada,
Erişeceği vahşi sondan, Kuklacı bana böyle buyurdu,
Belli belirsiz duruşlardan bir yol lütfediyor."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Harlequin
